source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Create logo animation with Adobe After Effects
items.headline: Learn to create minimal and elegant logo reveals with Adobe After Effects , a beginner's guide to logo animation
objectives_summary: Create a beautiful Logo Reveal animations
Use of shape layers in Adobe After Effects
Making smooth Animation

items.title: How to Texture 3D Aircraft Model in Maya & Substance Painter
items.headline: Master 3D Texturing & Modeling With Maya & Substance Painter: How to make high-quality textures from scratch!
objectives_summary: Texture the asset using Substance Painter
Preparing  the 3d object for texturing process
Learn  Research and Presentation techniques to find the reference for your models

items.title: Blender 3D Complete Volume One

visible_instructors.display_name: 3D BUZZ Programming and Digital Art training
visible_instructors.title: 3D BUZZ Programming and Digital Art training
visible_instructors.name: 3D BUZZ

items.headline: Go from newbie to pro with this in depth series designed to help you reach a "better than University" level of training.
objectives_summary: create complex 3D models and scenes using Blender's in depth modeling tools. You'll be able to apply what you learn to scenes and assets for games, animation, and film.
Work through several modeling exercises as well as a larger lab to cement what you've learned.
Grasp difficult concepts necessary to work at a professional level.

items.title: Mastering 2D Animation

visible_instructors.job_title: Award-winning Director, Animator, Author and Instructor.
visible_instructors.title: Tony White
visible_instructors.name: Tony

items.headline: Learn to be a master 2D animator, using hand-drawn and digital techniques.
objectives_summary: "Mastering 2D Animation: 01" will cover the following topics and many more...
A brief history of animation.
The production process of traditional 2D animation.

items.title: Rigging a Character in After Effects for Animation
items.headline: Take your Illustrator File and connect each body part to easily control your character for animation
objectives_summary: Take a character designed in Adobe Illustrator and prepare it for animation
How to rig a character in After Effects
How to set up replacement animation for lip sync, and switching hands

items.title: Fundamentals of CG VFX Compositing in Nuke - NK303
items.headline: A VFX Compositing course on integrating computer generated images into the real world, using Nuke!
objectives_summary: Integrating a CGI (Computer Generated Image) render into a real scene
Render layers (AOVs) inside of Nuke, and how to break them apart
Create dynamic lens flares based off of source imagery

items.title: SketchUp to LayOut
items.headline: The essential guide to creating construction documents with SketchUp Pro & LayOut
objectives_summary: Have complete control over the look of your viewports in LayOut
Create a complete set of construction documents inside LayOut including viewports, dimensions, annotations
Learn how to optimize your SketchUp models specifically for LayOut

items.title: How to Make Stylized Flat Color 3D Graphics With Blender
items.headline: Learn to easily create stylized 3d art for games and animation
objectives_summary: How to use Blender 2.8
How to make flat color 3d graphics for use in games and animation
How to pick color schemes for your art

items.title: 3ds Max 2019 Beginners Course
items.headline: Master 3ds Max 2019 & Arnold Renderer
objectives_summary: Understand all 3ds Max basics and go beyond
You will be beyond intermediate 3ds Max level
You will know how to create your own projects in 3ds Max

items.title: Maya for Beginners: Complete 3D Animation Fundamentals
items.headline: Complete training with practical exercises and comprehensive expert advice to mastering animation fundamentals.
objectives_summary: You will have fun learning how to use the Maya tools for animators
Why is the bouncing ball an absolute fundamental to master
Animate a bouncing ball with different weight

items.title: Character Modeling: Master the Anatomy of 3D Characters
items.headline: Step by Step Guide to Create 3D Characters in Blender
objectives_summary: This is a Great Start to Learn Character Anatomy for Absolute Beginners
You will Learn Face Character Anatomy
You will Learn how to Create All Face Components: "Mouth" - "Chin" - Eyes - Nose - Head Turn

items.title: Non-Destructive Hard Surface Modeling in Blender

visible_instructors.job_title: Sharing my knowledge and constantly expanding it.
visible_instructors.title: Josh Gambrell
visible_instructors.name: Josh

items.headline: Master non-destructive modeling techniques, boolean workflows, and bevel operations in the Blender software.
objectives_summary: Hard Surface Modeling
Non-Destructive Modeling
3D Modeling

items.title: Blender for VFX - Learn to add realistic CGI into footage
items.headline: Learn to use Blender in a professional workflow to create photorealistic CGI renders for your own visual effects shots!
objectives_summary: Matchmove the real camera motion using Blender
Match the lighting in a background video
Model a spaceship

items.title: 3D Animation for Architecture 3ds max + Vray (phase 1)
items.headline: a step by step work methods of producing great architectural animations.
objectives_summary: Architectural animation techniques that can only be taught in animation firms.
How to make deals with clients and calculate the pricing and timing .
How to design the storyboard for your movie  .

items.title: Blender 2.81 - Spiders and insects creation from scratch
items.headline: Discover a complete workflow for creating realistics insects and spiders for illustration or animation.
objectives_summary: Discover specific Blender 2.8 tools for modeling , texturing, rigging and animation
Create a realistic spider ready to render for illustrations or animations
Discover a workflow from A to Z for the creation of insects or spiders

items.title: Create Captain America's Motorcycle with Blender
items.headline: Learn hard surface modeling in Blender, how to manage a complex project, and how to light and render a scene.
objectives_summary: Create complex models in Blender
UV map and texture 3d objects
Light and render realistic scenes using Blender's Cycles render engine
